view.interfaces

Interface UpdatableObserver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractControllablePane, AbstractStratBtn, CmdPane, GrooveBox, GrooveBoxPanel, MusicPlayerPanel, PersonalJButton, PersonalJPanel, PersonalJTable, PlayerPanel, PlaylistPanel, Recorder, RecSpace, TimerController

    public interface UpdatableObserver
    This interface create an observer for a controller that need to update himself
    Author:
    Alessandro
